title: Wall Street Breakfast October 4: New York Fed's John Williams Peels Back The Inflation Onion
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Rally set to continue; Nasdaq, S&P, Dow futures jump as 2-year yield tests 4%. Stock market bottom talk gets louder, but Fed pivot hopes look more pie in the sky. New York Fed's John Williams peels back the inflation onion. Catch today’s WSB article seekingalpha.com/wsb. Start Your Free Trial of Seeking Alpha Premium - https://bit.ly/3uX5TDY.
